steps.description: Summarize the extracted content by extracting the key information like dates of employment, job title, and department.

tool_arguments.code:
text = """## Page 1

EXPERIENCE LETTER
Date:
To
Mr. _______
_____________ (residential address)
Phone No: ________________________
Sub: Experience Letter
Dear ___,
You have worked in our organization from ________ until ______ in the
capacity of __________ within _______ department.
Your performance during the employment has been appreciated in
evaluations each year and your contribution towards the
organization have always been valued.
We wish you all the best for your future endeavours.
Yours sincerely,
__________________________
[Insert Name]
"""
result = f"Based on the provided experience letter, the employee worked from ________ until ______ in the capacity of __________ within _______ department. The employee's performance was appreciated, and their contribution to the organization was valued."
return result
